formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Sort' =-
[Synopsis] Sorts a list of keywords and values
[Description] Sort(newvar=key1:val1[,key2:val2[[...],keyN:valN]]): This application will sort the list provided in ascending order. The result will be stored in the specified variable name. This application has been deprecated in favor of the SORT function.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
